Creating, building and growing our own businesses
See ProfileMy earlier professional experience was at the heart of financial services. I was a blue-chip institutional investor (F&C), in equity research sales (Goldman Sachs JBWere), as a wealth adviser (UBS) and as a top-rated investment consultant (Chawker).
Today I am the Founder of the Zendht Venture Studio, building new businesses to our own design, concept and execution. We listen, observe, think and act nimbly to solve challenges.
As a business founder, InnovateUK grant winner, and successful innovator, I am sensitive to the winds of change—and the opportunities they can offer.
I am currently active in businesses across financial services, professional networking, digital transformation, marketing, and national
cyber-security.
Zendht Venture Studio creates new businesses to its own concepts. Its roots lie with founding Chawker in 2011, and then subsequently including Vetted Adviser, Deklum, Leading Craftsmen and Lamwyk.
Selbey Anderson is a fast growing creative and marketing agency group headquartered in Clerkenwell.
